field.name: summary
field.value: Add support for MySql and Postgre to the Migrator

field.name: description
field.value:
Currently the Migrator is usable by: nant migrate but only supports MSDE/SQL Server database
The Migrator code is at https://svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/nproject/Migrator/trunk/
Please comment here if you plan to work on this, I think that some people have sarted to work on this so we better stay in sync.
I know Kevin is working on the Postgre provider and I plan to work on MySql in a couple of weeks.
